scripts.composer_remove: ssh user@109.172.39.139 "cd web/арско.рф/public_html && php composer.phar dumpauto"
scripts.composer_install: ssh user@109.172.39.139 "cd web/арско.рф/public_html && php composer.phar install --no-dev"
scripts.composer_update: ssh user@109.172.39.139 "cd web/арско.рф/public_html && php composer.phar update"
scripts.migrate_rep: ssh user@109.172.39.139 "cd web/арско.рф/public_html && php artisan migrate --force "
scripts.rollback_rep: ssh user@109.172.39.139 "cd web/арско.рф/public_html && php artisan migrate:rollback"
scripts.db_update_total: ssh user@109.172.39.139 "cd web/арско.рф/public_html && php artisan migrate:refresh --seed"
scripts.seed_rep: ssh user@109.172.39.139 "cd web/арско.рф/public_html && php artisan DB:seed"
scripts.seed_rep_one: ssh user@109.172.39.139 "cd web/арско.рф/public_html && php artisan DB:seed LendingSeeder --force"
scripts.seed_rep_one2: ssh user@109.172.39.139 "cd web/арско.рф/public_html && php artisan DB:seed InformationSeeder --force"
scripts.optimized_rep: ssh user@109.172.39.139 "cd web/арско.рф/public_html && php composer.phar update --optimize-autoloader --no-dev"
scripts.dump_autoload: ssh user@109.172.39.139 "cd web/арско.рф/public_html && php composer.phar dump-autoload"
scripts.storage_link: ssh user@109.172.39.139 "cd web/арско.рф/public_html && php artisan storage:link"
scripts.key_gen: ssh user@109.172.39.139 "cd web/арско.рф/public_html && php artisan key:generate"
scripts.cache_config: ssh user@109.172.39.139 "cd web/арско.рф/public_html && php artisan config:cache"
scripts.cache_route: ssh user@109.172.39.139 "cd web/арско.рф/public_html && php artisan route:cache"
scripts.cache_view: ssh user@109.172.39.139 "cd web/арско.рф/public_html && php artisan view:cache"
scripts.cache_clear: ssh user@109.172.39.139 "cd web/арско.рф/public_html && php artisan cache:clear"
scripts.optimize: ssh user@109.172.39.139 "cd web/арско.рф/public_html && php artisan optimize"
scripts.optimize_all: npm run optimize && npm run cache_clear && npm run cache_view && npm run cache_route && npm run cache_config
scripts.orchid_user: ssh user@109.172.39.139 "cd web/арско.рф/public_html && php artisan orchid:admin admin asmi046@gmail.com 123"
scripts.deploy_m: vite build && npm run send_vite_build && npm run pull_rep && npm run optimize_all && npm run chmode
